lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : 朱隽言/Hathaway Donny Edward
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Hutson Leroy
[00:07.98]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[00:18.85]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[00:33.11]Say I'm talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[00:38.71]The ghetto the ghetto
[00:45.33]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[00:46.94]The ghetto
[00:48.81]Say again say again say again
[00:51.28]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[01:03.91]The ghetto
[01:05.39]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[01:08.46]The ghetto
[01:08.91]Yo
[01:09.47]Welcome to the ghetto
[01:10.72]This is a life living in another level
[01:12.67]Maneuvering down the road in a truck with no brake pedal
[01:14.79]Once we start busting there's no chance for us stopping no
[01:17.61]See I ain't born with a silver spoon
[01:19.12]Starting from a sinkhole but we're now standing on the moon
[01:21.44]Crawling in the shadow just to make a living
[01:23.24]Natural selection is the only thing that we believe in
[01:25.50]And all these people like my brother with the same blood
[01:27.39]If we don't go fighting then I guess we will be all done
[01:30.23]Everday's another struggle for survival
[01:31.66]One step mistaken you'll be tripping in another pothole
[01:33.90]Cause it's
[01:34.25]The real world
[01:34.81]That makes me
[01:35.33]And breaks me
[01:35.86]And it suffocate me
[01:36.81]They won't succeed
[01:37.53]Cause I'll break free
[01:38.33]I'll be the last one standing after all the agony
[01:40.38]Chasing the dragon in a twisted fantasy
[02:09.12]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[02:13.23]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[02:16.34]The ghetto
[02:17.40]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[02:20.53]The ghetto
[02:21.65]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[03:58.95]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[04:10.85]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[04:23.62]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[04:36.31]The ghetto the ghetto
[04:44.86]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[04:57.46]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[05:10.19]The ghetto the ghetto the ghetto
[05:22.10]Talkin' 'bout the ghetto
[05:25.16]The ghetto
tlyric:
[by:FloydMorphine]
[00:07.98]贫民窟 贫民窟 贫民窟
[00:18.85]贫民窟 贫民窟 贫民窟
[00:33.11]我说的是贫民窟
[00:38.71]贫民窟 贫民窟
[00:45.33]说一说贫民窟
[00:46.94]贫民窟
[00:48.81]再说一遍 再说一遍 再说一遍
[00:51.28]贫民窟 贫民窟 贫民窟
[01:03.91]贫民窟
[01:05.39]说一说贫民窟
[01:08.46]贫民窟
[01:08.91]Yo
[01:09.47]欢迎来到贫民窟
[01:10.72]这是另一个等级的生活
[01:12.67]行驶没有刹车踏板的卡车
[01:14.79]我们一旦开始进攻，就没有机会停下来
[01:17.61]我不是含着金汤匙出生的
[01:19.12]从一个天坑出现，我们站在月球上
[01:21.44]在阴影中爬行只是为了谋生
[01:23.24]我们只相信物竞天择
[01:25.50]所有人都像我的兄弟一样，和我流着相同的血
[01:27.39]如果不去打架，我想我们都会被干掉
[01:30.23]每天为了生存而斗争
[01:31.66]一步错，步步错
[01:33.90]因为这是
[01:34.25]真实的世界
[01:34.81]它成就了我
[01:35.33]伤害了我
[01:35.86]使我窒息
[01:36.81]他们不会得逞
[01:37.53]因为我会挣脱
[01:38.33]我会是笑到最后的人
[01:40.38]在扭曲的幻想中追逐龙

[02:13.23]说一说贫民窟
